column1: Uchi////1. Waygu Beef Special - Hands down
column2: the best beef I've ever tasted. It tastes like the best Texas brisket you've never had. Cooked sous-vide
column5: and perfectly peppered. If it didn't cost an arm and a leg
column6: I could eat this every day for the rest of my life. It comes with some other accoutrements depending on the day
column7: but I'm all about the beef.
